text: Mikowice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kłodzko, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Kłodzko and south of the regional capital Wrocław. Mikowice ==References== Mikowice
title: Mikowice, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
